thm blfvalps(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cfv(cbl, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  fvmptd2(hs0, cbl, c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)))), universe, cmpo(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cxr, crab(s2, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)))), universe, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  df-bl(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cxr, crab(s2, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))), c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqidd(cxr, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  rabeqbidv(s2, cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)))
  sylan9eqr(cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), c1, cdm(cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeqd(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  dmeq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqcomd(cdm(cdm(c0)), c1, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  psmetdmdm(c0, c1)
  breq1d(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  oveqd(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s2), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  elex(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)))), universe), wf(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)))), cxp(c1, cxr), cpw(c1)), wcel(cxp(c1, cxr), universe), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wf(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)))), cxp(c1, cxr), cpw(c1)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, cxr, wcel(crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))), cpw(c1)))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, cxr, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))), cpw(c1)))
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cxr))), wcel(crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))), cpw(c1)), wss(crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))), c1))
  ssrab2(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cxr))), wb(wcel(crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))), cpw(c1)), wss(crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))), c1)), wcel(c1, cdm(cpsmet)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), cxr)), wcel(c1, cdm(cpsmet)))
  elpw2g(c1, cdm(cpsmet), crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))))
  fmpt2(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))), cpw(c1), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)))))
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)))))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(cxp(c1, cxr), universe), wcel(c1, cdm(cpsmet)), wcel(cxr, universe))
  xrex()
  xpexg(c1, cdm(cpsmet), cxr, universe)
  pwexd(c1, cdm(cpsmet), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  elfvdm(c0, cpsmet, c1)
  fex2(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)))), cxp(c1, cxr), cpw(c1), universe, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s2, cdm(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cdm.s(s2, cv(hs0))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c1)
}

thm blfvalps(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚Üí(ball ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  fvmptd2(hs0, cbl, c0, (s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }), universe, (s0 ‚àà dom(dom(hs0)), s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà dom(dom(hs0))|(s0[hs0]s2)[<]s1 }), universe, c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1))
  df-bl(hs0, s0, s1, s2)
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, dom(dom(hs0)), cxr, { s2 ‚àà dom(dom(hs0))|(s0[hs0]s2)[<]s1 }, c1, cxr, { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }, (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  eqidd(cxr, (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  rabeqbidv(s2, dom(dom(hs0)), c1, (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0), (s0[hs0]s2)[<]s1, (s0[c0]s2)[<]s1)
  sylan9eqr(dom(dom(hs0)), c1, dom(dom(c0)), c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  dmeqd(dom(hs0), dom(c0), hs0 = c0)
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  eqcomd(dom(dom(c0)), c1, c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1))
  psmetdmdm(c0, c1)
  breq1d((s0[hs0]s2), clt, s1, (s0[c0]s2), (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  oveqd(s0, hs0, s2, c0, (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  elex(c0, (PsMet ` c1))
  syl3anc(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), (s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 })‚àà ùïå, ((s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }):(c1 √ó ‚Ñù*)‚Üí P(c1)), (c1 √ó ‚Ñù*)‚àà ùïå, P(c1)‚àà ùïå)
  sylib(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), ((s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }):(c1 √ó ‚Ñù*)‚Üí P(c1)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 } ‚àà P(c1))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, cxr, c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 } ‚àà P(c1))
  mpbiri((c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)), { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 } ‚àà P(c1), { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 } ‚äÜ c1)
  ssrab2(s2, c1, (s0[c0]s2)[<]s1)
  syl((c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)), ({ s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 } ‚àà P(c1)‚Üî { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 } ‚äÜ c1), c1 ‚àà dom(PsMet))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), c1 ‚àà dom(PsMet))
  elpw2g(c1, dom(PsMet), { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 })
  fmpt2(s0, s1, c1, cxr, { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }, P(c1), (s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }))
  sylancl(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), (c1 √ó ‚Ñù*)‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà dom(PsMet), ‚Ñù* ‚àà ùïå)
  xrex()
  xpexg(c1, dom(PsMet), cxr, universe)
  pwexd(c1, dom(PsMet), c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1))
  elfvdm(c0, cpsmet, c1)
  fex2((s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }), (c1 √ó ‚Ñù*), P(c1), universe, universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s2, dom(hs0))
  diff.cdm.s(s2, hs0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, (PsMet ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (PsMet ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, (PsMet ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, c1)
}

blocks.name: blfval
blocks.content: The value of the ball function. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.) (Proof shortened by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm blfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wceq(cfv(cbl, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wceq(cfv(cbl, c0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, cxr, crab(s2, c1, wbr(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), clt, cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  xmetpsmet(c0, c1)
  blfvalps(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)
}

thm blfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(*Met ` c1)‚Üí(ball ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  syl(c0 ‚àà(*Met ` c1), (ball ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà c1, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà c1 |(s0[c0]s2)[<]s1 }), c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1))
  xmetpsmet(c0, c1)
  blfvalps(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: blvalps
blocks.content: The ball around a point ` P ` is the set of all points whose distance from ` P ` is less than the ball's radius ` R ` . (Contributed by NM, 31-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm blvalps(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)), wceq(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), c3), crab(s0, c1, wbr(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), clt, c3))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c2, cfv(cbl, c0), c3, crab(s0, c1, wbr(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), clt, c3)), c1, cxr, crab(s0, c1, wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs1))), universe, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr), wceq(cfv(cbl, c0), cmpo(hs0, hs1, c1, cxr, crab(s0, c1, wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs1))))))
  blfvalps(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1)
  rabbidv(s0, c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))), wbr(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), clt, c3))
  breq12d(co(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)), clt, cv(hs1), co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), c3, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))))
  oveq1d(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))))
  simprl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  simprr(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)), wcel(crab(s0, c1, wbr(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), clt, c3)), universe), wcel(c1, cdm(cpsmet)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, cdm(cpsmet)))
  elfvdm(c0, cpsmet, c1)
  rabexg(s0, c1, cdm(cpsmet), wbr(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), clt, c3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, c1, wbr(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), clt, c3)))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(s0, c1, wbr(co(c2, c0, cv(s0)), clt, c3)))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)))

blocks.name: blpnf
blocks.content: The infinity ball in a standard metric is just the whole space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm blpnf(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf), c1))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cr)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cr))), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)))
  metxmet(c0, c1)
  xblpnf(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  pm4.71d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cr))
  3expia(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cr))
  metcl(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))
}

  3expia(c0 ‚àà(Met ` c1), c2 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c1, (c2[c0]hs0)‚àà ‚Ñù)

blocks.name: bldisj
blocks.content: Two balls are disjoint if the center-to-center distance is more than the sum of the radii. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm bldisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, cxr), wcel(c5, cxr), wbr(co(c4, cxad, c5), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)))), wceq(cin(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), c4), co(c3, cfv(cbl, c0), c5)), emptycls))
} = {
  eq0rdv(hs0, cin(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), c4), co(c3, cfv(cbl, c0), c5)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, cxr), wcel(c5, cxr), wbr(co(c4, cxad, c5), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)))))
  mtod(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c4, cxr), wcel(c5, cxr), wbr(co(c4, cxad, c5), cle, co(c2, c0, c3)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), c4), co(c3, cfv(cbl, c0), c5))), wbr(co(c2, c0, c3), clt, co(c4, cxad, c5)))

blocks.name: xblss2ps
blocks.content: One ball is contained in another if the center-to-center distance is less than the difference of the radii. In this version of ~ blss2 for extended metrics, we have to assume the balls are a finite distance apart, or else ` P ` will not even be in the infinity ball around ` Q ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: xblss2
blocks.content: One ball is contained in another if the center-to-center distance is less than the difference of the radii. In this version of ~ blss2 for extended metrics, we have to assume the balls are a finite distance apart, or else ` P ` will not even be in the infinity ball around ` Q ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: blhalf
blocks.content: A ball of radius ` R / 2 ` is contained in a ball of radius ` R ` centered at any point inside the smaller ball. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jan-2014.)

thm blhalf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

} = {
  syl33anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), co(c3, cdiv, nat2))))), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), co(c3, cdiv, nat2)), co(c4, cfv(cbl, c0), c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(co(c3, cdiv, nat2), cr), wcel(c3, cr), wbr(co(c2, c0, c4), cle, co(c3, cmin, co(c3, cdiv, nat2))))

  xrltled(co(c2, c0, c4), co(c3, cdiv, nat2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), co(c3, cdiv, nat2))))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), co(c3, cdiv, nat2))))), wcel(co(c2, c0, c4), cxr), wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1))

  mpbid(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), co(c3, cdiv, nat2))))), wa(wcel(c4, c1), wbr(co(c2, c0, c4), clt, co(c3, cdiv, nat2))), wcel(c4, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), co(c3, cdiv, nat2))))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), co(c3, cdiv, nat2))))

  simpll(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), co(c3, cdiv, nat2)))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), co(c3, cdiv, nat2)))))
  rexrd(co(c3, cdiv, nat2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), co(c3, cdiv, nat2))))))

  2halvesd(c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), co(c3, cdiv, nat2))))))

  blss2(c0, c1, c2, c4, co(c3, cdiv, nat2), c3)

blocks.name: blss
blocks.content: Any point ` P ` in a ball ` B ` can be centered in another ball that is a subset of ` B ` . (Contributed by NM, 31-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: blssexps
blocks.content: Two ways to express the existence of a ball subset. (Contributed by NM, 5-May-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Mar-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm blssexps(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wrex(s0, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))), wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wrex(s0, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))), wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3)))
  rexlimdva(s0, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)), wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3)))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(s0), crn(cfv(cbl, c0))), wi(wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)), wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3))))
  expimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(cfv(cbl, c0)))), wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3)))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), crn(cfv(cbl, c0))), wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wi(wss(cv(s0), c3), wrex(s1, crp, wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3))))

  blssps(s1, c0, c1, cv(s0), c2)
  reximdv(s1, crp, wss(cv(s0), c3), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3))
  expcom(wss(cv(s0), c3), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3))

  syl12anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), crp), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3))), wrex(s0, crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3))), wcel(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), crn(cfv(cbl, c0))), wcel(c2, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1))), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), crp), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3))), wcel(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), crn(cfv(cbl, c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(s1), cxr))

  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(s1), crp), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3))
  rspcev(s0, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), crn(cfv(cbl, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1))), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3)), wa(wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1))), wcel(c2, cv(s0)), wss(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c2, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1))), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3))
  eleq2(cv(s0), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c2)
  sseq1(cv(s0), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cv(s1)), c3)

  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s0)

blocks.name: blin2
blocks.content: Given any two balls and a point in their intersection, there is a ball contained in the intersection with the given center point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: xmetec
blocks.content: The equivalence classes under the finite separation equivalence relation are infinity balls. Thus, by ~ erdisj , infinity balls are either identical or disjoint, quite unlike the usual situation with Euclidean balls which admit many kinds of overlap. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xmetec(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cec(c2, c3), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)))
  -| wceq(c3, cima(ccnv(c0), cr))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cec(c2, c3), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))
  3bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)), wbr(c2, c3, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cr)))
  sylan9bb(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wbr(c2, c3, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cr)), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cr)))
  xmeterval(c0, c1, c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  baib(wcel(c2, c1), w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cr)))
  3anass(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(co(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), cr))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c3)), wbr(c2, c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  elecg(cv(hs0), universe, c2, c1, c3)
  xblpnf(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cec(c2, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(*Met ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí[c2]c3 =(c2[(ball ` c0)]+‚àû))

  sylan(c0 ‚àà(*Met ` c1), c2 ‚àà c1, (hs0 ‚àà[c2]c3 ‚Üî c2[c3]hs0), hs0 ‚àà ùïå)

blocks.name: blssec
blocks.content: A ball centered at ` P ` is contained in the set of points finitely separated from ` P ` . This is just an application of ~ ssbl to the infinity ball. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm blssec(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), c3), cec(c2, c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, cima(ccnv(c0), cr))
} = {
  sseqtr4d(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), c3), cec(c2, c4), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)))
  3impa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), c3), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)))
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cxr)), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), c3), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)), wbr(c3, cle, cpnf))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cxr), wbr(c3, cle, cpnf))
  pnfge(c3)
  mpanr2(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cxr), wi(wbr(c3, cle, cpnf), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), c3), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf))), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  3expia(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr)), wbr(c3, cle, cpnf), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), c3), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)))
  ssbl(c0, c1, c2, c3, cpnf)
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr), wceq(cec(c2, c4), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)))
  xmetec(c0, c1, c2, c4)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(*Met ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)‚Üí(c2[(ball ` c0)]c3)‚äÜ[c2]c4)

blocks.name: blpnfctr
blocks.content: The infinity ball in an extended metric acts like an ultrametric ball in that every point in the ball is also its center. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  eleqtrrd(c3, cec(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), cr)), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf))))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)))

  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)), wceq(cec(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), cr)), co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)))

  sselda(c3, co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1)))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wss(co(c2, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf), c1), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  blssm(c0, c1, c2, cpnf)
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1), wceq(cec(c3, cima(ccnv(c0), cr)), co(c3, cfv(cbl, c0), cpnf)))

blocks.name: xmetresbl
blocks.content: An extended metric restricted to any ball (in particular the infinity ball) is a proper metric. Together with ~ xmetec , this shows that any extended metric space can be "factored" into the disjoint union of proper metric spaces, with points in the same region measured by that region's metric, and points in different regions being distance ` +oo ` from each other. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)

  fssresd(c0, cxp(c4, c4), cxr, cxp(c1, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)))

  adantrr(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cxr)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), cr))))
